entry.title: Jerusalemโs Armenian community attacked by a mob amid land dispute

media:group.media:title: Jerusalemโs Armenian community attacked by a mob amid land dispute
media:group.media:description:
A piece of land in Jerusalemโs Armenian Quarter came under attack by a mob of 30 men on Thursday, amid a dispute over a lease for a luxury hotel. The Armenian Patriarchate responded by calling the events a โmassive and coordinated attackโ which poses an โexistential threatโ to the Armenian community of Jerusalem. This CivilNet special report delves into the latest escalation amid the Jerusalem Armenian communityโs struggle to survive.
For more context on the wider dispute, watch CivilNetโs two part documentary from Jerusalem here: Part 1- https://youtu.be/l6nJbBqx8Bw Part 2- https://youtu.be/vfxWCw0OcwU

ิฑีดีกีถีธึีซีถ ีจีถีคีกีผีกีป ีฝีฏีฝีพีธึีด ีฅีถ ีฟีธีถีกีฏีกีถ ีฝีฅีฒีกีถีซ ีทีธึึีป ึีถีถีกึีฏีธึีดีถีฅึีถ ีธึ ึีถีถีกีคีกีฟีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจึ ีีถีกีตีกีฎ ีทีกีฟ ีจีถีฟีกีถีซึีถีฅึ ีถีกีญีจีถีฟึีธึีด ีฅีถ ีฟีธีถีจ ีถีทีฅีฌีธึ ีกีตีฌีจีถีฟึีกีถึีกีตีซีถ ีฟีกึีขีฅึีกีฏีถีฅึ ีฃีฟีถีฅีฌี ีทีกีฟีฅึีจ, ีกีตีถีธึีกีดีฅีถีกีตีถีซีพ, ีทีกึีธึีถีกีฏีธึีด ีฅีถ ีฐีกีพีกีฟีกึีซีด ีดีถีกีฌ ีกีพีกีถีคีกีฏีกีถีซีถึ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีจ ีฐีกีทีพีกึีฏีฅีฌ ีง, ีฉีฅ ีธึึีกีถ ีฃีธึีดีกึ ีง ีฐีกึีฏีกีพีธึ ีดีฅีฏ ีจีถีฟีกีถีซึีซีถ ีฟีธีถีกีฏีกีถ ีฝีฅีฒีกีถีซ ีฎีกีญีฝีฅึีจ ีฐีธีฃีกีฌีธึ ีฐีกีดีกึึ
ีีถีธึีฐีกีฏีกีฌีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีฅีถึ ีฐีกีตีฟีถีธึีด ิถีธีพึ ีฝีธึีบีฅึีดีกึีฏีฅีฟีถีฅึีซ ึีกีถึีซีถ ีถีฏีกึีกีฐีกีถีธึีดีจ ีฐีถีกึีกีพีธึ ีคีกึีฑีถีฅีฌีธึ ีฐีกีดีกึึ

entry.title: After Artsakh: Maintaining Gains, Learning Lessons in the Post-War Era

media:group.media:title: After Artsakh: Maintaining Gains, Learning Lessons in the Post-War Era
media:group.media:description:
In this year-end episode of The Weekly Civilnet Podcast, hosts Patrick Elliott and Eric Hacopian take stock of 2023. They evaluate key events like the fall of Artsakh, Armenia's foreign policy maneuvering, and economic and security challenges. Elliott and Hacopian also consider opportunities on the horizon as they discuss their assessment of where Armenia currently stands.
